text: ñaṅṅaḷuṭe mumpāke oru bali naṭatti atine divyāgni tinnukaḷayunnat (ñaṅṅaḷkk kāṇiccutarunnat‌) vare oru daivadūtaniluṁ ñaṅṅaḷ viśvasikkarutenn allāhu ñaṅṅaḷēāṭ karāṟu vāṅṅiyiṭṭuṇṭ enn paṟaññavaratre avar. (nabiyē,) paṟayuka: vyaktamāya teḷivukaḷ sahitavuṁ, niṅṅaḷ ī paṟaññat sahitavuṁ enikk mump pala dūtanmāruṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe aṭutt vanniṭṭuṇṭ‌. enniṭṭ niṅṅaḷuṭe vādaṁ satyamāṇeṅkil niṅṅaḷentin avare keānnukaḷaññu
